name: Isabel (captaindiz, scho22, Puggytatoes, JadDoggy, JP-Homer, Pachwoom, Funbam)
name_original: Isabel (captaindiz, scho22, Puggytatoes, JadDoggy, JP-Homer, Pachwoom, Funbam)
description:
The world has been overrun by an unending horde of demons. The angels up in Heaven refuse to step down to help from their lofty perches up above, for it would mean losing their wings. All, except one.

Play as Isabel as she descends upon the demon hordes, guns blazing with her holy wrath!

Isabel is a pitch project for UCI's VGDC Winter Quarter 2022.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS
Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click

Weapon Swap - Scroll Mouse Wheel Up/Down

Pause - P

Access Main Menu - Esc
